title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday

This Friday, you can save on oil diffusers, Apple Airpods, and more. (Photo: InnoGear / Apple)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Happy Friday! Whether you're getting a jumpstart on your holiday shopping or you're just bored and looking for a fun way to treat yourself after a long week, the best Amazon deals happening now can help you save a ton of money and get some pretty neat stuff in the process. Here are our favorite discounts that you can grab for Friday.

More: The 25 best gifts under $50 of 2019

1. Lowest price ever: Our favorite oil diffuser

Stop and smell the diffuser. (Photo: InnoGear/Reviewed.com/Jackson Ruckar)

Aromatherapy is one of my favorite ways to self-care, since essential oils seems to have an almost immediate effect on my space (and mood), making any place I'm in feel instantly more zen-like. The easiest way to get that soothing scent of lavender, or energizing aroma of peppermint wafting throughout your pad? An oil diffuser. And right now, you can snag the best oil diffuser we've ever tried for it's actual lowest price ever—just under $10. Seriously, we've never seen the InnoGear drop this low in price, so it's a really good deal to grab right now while you can. It can also run for nine hours and glows in up to seven fun colors, which adds a lot of nice ambiance to any room.

Get the InnoGear Upgraded 150ml Diffuser for $9.99 (Save $5)

2. Deal alert: This cute bath pillow

This spa pillow is finally on sale. (Photo: Gorilla Grip)

Speaking of relaxation, long baths are one of my favorite ways to unwind after a long day and having a pillow just takes that comfort to a next level. Right now, you can get one of the most popular spa pillows on Amazon for its lowest price yet, at just about $13. This pillow comes with seven powerful suction cups, so it always stays in place, plus it has a roomy two-panel design, so it can support your neck, back, and shoulder as you recline. This also makes a great present for anyone who you know who really values their self-care time.

Get the Gorilla Grip Original Spa Bath Pillow for $12.99 (Save $5)

3. Best price: These Apple Airpods that make a great gift

These Apple Airpods make a great gift for anyone on your list—and you can save on them right now. (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey Goldwasser)

Apple products almost never go on sale—which, if you're an Apple snob like me, you probably know—so any kind of price drop feels like a rare thing as it is. A discount on AirPods though, i.e. the best true wireless earbuds of 2019? Sign me up. This sale price has lasted for a few weeks now, but it's still completely amazing, and saving $14 on a set of earbuds that offer impressive audio quality and ultra-long battery life like this is so totally worth it. Convinced you need a pair yet? Right now, you can get them for $144.99, so do it up now while the sale is still good.

Get the Apple AirPods with Charging Case (Latest Model) for $144.99 (Save $14.01)

4. Save $35: The best facial cleansing brush we've ever tested

Our favorite facial cleansing brush is on sale for a killer discount. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Designed to make your face feel softer and cleaner, this facial cleansing brush from Clarisonic is the best we've ever tested—and right now, you can get it for its lowest price ever. With the Mia Smart, you're basically get a souped of version of the Mia 2, with more features, including Bluetooth technology. Our testers say it gently oscillates in a way that feels almost like a vibration, and is gentle on skin.

The Mia Smart is also compatible with all Clarisonic brush heads, including the cleansing, anti-aging, exfoliation, and makeup ones, which is perfect if you're like me and you have a bunch of unused brush heads from your old Mia 2 (which I have an still love, and which is our former favorite but has since been discontinued). This brush usually retails for $169, but you can get it for about $135 on Amazon, which is cheaper than what it costs at Sephora right now, and undoubtedly makes it one of those great pre-Black Friday deals to snag while you can.

Get the Clarisonic Mia Smart Sonic Facial Cleansing Brush for $135.20 (Save $35)

5. Under $100: Save on these best-selling espresso machines

Brew the perfect cup thanks to this Gold box deal. (Photo: Nespresso)

Love espresso and coffee? Amazon's Gold Box Deal of the Day is the one you've been waiting for then. Right now, you can score almost 60% off three high-end coffee and espresso machines, including the Nespresso ENV135S Vertuo Evoluo by De'Longhi, the Breville Nespresso Vertuo, and the Nespresso ENV135GY. In our testing of the best pod coffee makers, we really enjoyed the Evoluo, and thought it was an excellent choice for anyone looking for the convenience of a pod brewer, but who still want great flavor. At under $100, this is the best price we've seen on every one of these machines, but because it's a Gold Box deal, you should definitely grab one ASAP before this discount price expires.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
